project_description: Here's a list of some of the projects I've worked on.

projectsList.title: My Password Manager
projectsList.description: My Password Manager is a Chrome extension to store, autofill, and submit your information to any website. Every bit of data is encrypted using AES and stored in the Firebase Firestore database. The extension provides a popup with a login, a signup, and a dashboard page. Rated 5/5 on the Chrome Web Store.

projectsList.title: Esieabot Mobile App
projectsList.description: The Esieabot mobile application allows you to control the robot Esieabot remotely via Bluetooth. It includes features such as: -Robot control via four directional arrows. -Live viewing of the robot camera -A return to home function -Activation of the ultrasonic sensor  -Room scan function  -A user guide -Automatic pairing with a new robot  -Configuration of the robot's wifi via the app.

projectsList.title: Portfolio Website
projectsList.description: Development of my personal portfolio to showcase all my projects. The website is deployed on Vercel under my custom domain name. I used Next.js to develop the website and Tailwind CSS for the styling. I also use Flowbite to create the main components. Many improvements are planned for the future.

projectsList.title: Python Management System
projectsList.description: Grocery store management system made for my Python course at Centria University. The system is made with Python and custom Tkinter. It allows you to manage products and orders.

projectsList.title: AES
projectsList.description: Implementation of AES 128 in C. It allows you to encrypt and decrypt a message with a custom key using the official documentation of AES. made for my cryptography course at ESIEA.
